name: R.I.Pair
description:
R.I.Pair is our very first Global Gamejam project with this team!

It is a Multi-Character singleplayer maze traversal game, in which various body parts of a Zombie try to reassemble and pair up, overcoming different traversal obstacles to eventually re-pair itself and become whole again.

Design:

Alex Radulov
Boyd Catsman
Linda Effinger
Sven de Wit
Tim Wondergem
Timo Bron

Art:

Coen van Oorschot
Danielle Viljoen
Kim Baaij
Sheila Stipnieks

We hope you enjoy our game, and thank you for checking it out!
